code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from"react";import ActivitesService from"../../services/activitiesService";import HTMLService from"../../services/htmlService";import'./activityList.css';function ActivityList(){const[activities,setActivities]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{async function fetchActivities(){const activityList=await ActivitesService.getActivities();setActivities(activityList);};fetchActivities();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:"activity-list"},activities.map(activity=>{return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:"activity",key:activity.id},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:"activity-image",style:{backgroundImage:"url("+HTMLService.sanatizeHTML(activity.excerpt.rendered)+")"}}),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("p",{className:"activity-title"},activity.title.rendered),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("p",null,HTMLService.sanatizeHTML(activity.content.rendered)));}));}export default ActivityList;
